column4: um, im not running ubuntu per say, running backtrack4r1, and ohci_hcd, ehci_hcd are not compiled as modules, dont know exactly.. but if u do menuconfig they are marked with * if u know what i mean..
got a usb 2.0 device that should be taken care of ehci-hcd, instead dmesg says it loads with ohcd_hcd
no, its a hd installation, its a wireless usb stick
